title: Another Scandal Erupts Involving This Sleazeball Democrat (Ep 1669)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest scandal to envelope this sleazy Democrat. 

News Picks:


Twitter gets caught trying to censor the truth.


Adam Schiff gets caught in another major hoax.

CNN tops the list of most-biased for 2021.

Podcast consumption is exploding.

The federal debt is exploding, here’s what it equates to per household. 

The Biden White House thinks blaming “big meat” will distract America from his inflation crisis.
